nodes.excerpt: Think of Speeko like a gym membership for your voice. Get instant feedback on your speaking style, and track your progress over time. Personalized activities help you build new skills in just 5 minutes a day. You'll be speaking with confidence in no time!

nodes.excerpt: Eqtble unlocks the value of your HR data by answering why top performers are leaving and why qualified candidates are declining offers. Built by connecting with 150+ systems, we deliver insights on Workforce, Talent Acquisition, Engagement, and Compensation.

localize.description: Eqtble通过回答为什么表现优异的员工会离开，为什么合格的候选人会拒绝聘用，来释放您的人力资源数据的价值。通过与150多个系统的连接，我们提供关于劳动力、人才招聘、参与和薪酬的见解。
localize.tagline: 让企业轻松从人力资源数据中获得洞察力。

localize.description: Eqtble通過回答爲什麼表現優異的員工會離開，爲什麼合格的候選人會拒絕聘用，來釋放您的人力資源數據的價值。通過與150多個系統的連接，我們提供關於勞動力、人才招聘、參與和薪酬的見解。
localize.tagline: 讓企業輕鬆從人力資源數據中獲得洞察力。

nodes.excerpt: Viable is a user experience analysis engine that aggregrates, sorts, and tags helpdesk, survey, and live chat customer feedback so you can ask questions about what your customers think, feel, and do -- and get human-like answers in seconds, powered by GPT-3.
nodes.title: Viable - Find immediate insights in surveys, helpdesk, and reviews
nodes.author: Todd Goldberg

localize.description: Viable是一个用户体验分析引擎，它可以对服务台、调查和即时聊天的客户反馈进行汇总、分类和标记，这样你就可以就客户的想法、感受和行为提出问题，并在几秒钟内得到类似于人类的答案，它由GPT-3提供技术支持。
localize.tagline: 在调查、帮助台和评论中找到即时的见解。

localize.description: Viable是一個用戶體驗分析引擎，它可以對服務檯、調查和即時聊天的客戶反饋進行彙總、分類和標記，這樣你就可以就客戶的想法、感受和行爲提出問題，並在幾秒鐘內得到類似於人類的答案，它由GPT-3提供技術支持。
localize.tagline: 在調查、幫助臺和評論中找到即時的見解。

nodes.excerpt: Web Analytics made simple and therefore privacy friendly. No Cookies. No logging. No IP address fingerprinting. We don't collect personal data, which allows serving many users with little hosting costs. The source code is published under the AGPL‑v3 licence.

localize.description: 网络分析变得简单，因此对隐私友好。没有Cookies。没有记录。没有IP地址指纹。我们不收集个人数据，这允许以较少的托管成本为许多用户服务。源代码是在AGPL-v3许可下发布的。

nodes.excerpt: 🌍 Unfolded Studio is a geospatial analytics platform that makes it easy to drag and drop LARGE datasets to create powerful visualizations from your browser and share with the team!
nodes.title: Unfolded Studio - Explore a world of data with advanced geospatial analytics
nodes.author: Chris Messina

localize.description: 🌍 Unfolded Studio是一个地理空间分析平台，可以轻松地拖放大型数据集，从浏览器中创建强大的可视化，并与团队分享。
localize.tagline: 利用先进的地理空间分析技术探索数据世界。

localize.description: 🌍 Unfolded Studio是一個地理空間分析平臺，可以輕鬆地拖放大型數據集，從瀏覽器中創建強大的可視化，並與團隊分享。
localize.tagline: 利用先進的地理空間分析技術探索數據世界。

nodes.excerpt: Remote usability testing tool that supports both qualitative and quantitative research. Eye tracking, emotion recognition, heatmaps, replays, interactive polls, live sessions and much more by simply sharing a link.
nodes.title: Mupixa 2.0 - Remote usability testing, eye tracking, heatmaps, replays
nodes.author: Vladimir Daskalov

localize.description: 远程可用性测试工具，支持定性和定量研究。只需分享一个链接，就能实现眼球跟踪、情感识别、热图、重播、互动投票、实时会话等功能。
localize.tagline: 远程可用性测试、眼动跟踪、热图、重播。

localize.description: 遠程可用性測試工具，支持定性和定量研究。只需分享一個鏈接，就能實現眼球跟蹤、情感識別、熱圖、重播、互動投票、實時會話等功能。
localize.tagline: 遠程可用性測試、眼動跟蹤、熱圖、重播。

nodes.excerpt: Build an admin panel for your Rails application in a minute. No code, no hassle — save time and money by trying Forest Admin for free.
nodes.title: Forest Admin for Rails - Fully-featured admin panel for Ruby on Rails apps
nodes.author: Nicolas Dessaigne

localize.description: 在一分钟内为您的Rails应用程序建立一个管理面板。没有代码，没有麻烦--免费试用Forest Admin，节省时间和金钱。
localize.tagline: 为Ruby on Rails应用程序提供功能齐全的管理面板。

localize.description: 在一分鐘內爲您的Rails應用程序建立一個管理面板。沒有代碼，沒有麻煩--免費試用Forest Admin，節省時間和金錢。
localize.tagline: 爲Ruby on Rails應用程序提供功能齊全的管理面板。
